coreAtributes.name: Hobnailed Boots
coreAtributes.description: A pair of heavy leather boots, with a complimentary pair of heavy woollen socks. The soles are made of metal plates,with spikes to improve traction, and the toes are steel, as well.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull off your Hobnailed Boots.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on your Hobnailed Boots.
replacementText.playerNPC: You pull [npc.name]'s Hobnailed Boots onto their feet.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You shove [npc.name]'s Hobnailed Boots onto their feet.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] pulls your Hobnailed Boots onto your feet.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] shoves your Hobnailed Boots onto your feet.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] pulls [npc2.name]'s Hobnailed Boots onto their feet.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] shoves [npc2.name]'s Hobnailed Boots onto their feet.
